release.description: This release of the Transport Proxy is a point build of the component for the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of the Transport Proxy is a point build of the component for the integrated release 6.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated the JRE requirement to 1.7 in the Installation document.

release.description: This release of the Transport Proxy is a point build of the component for the integrated release 6.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated the end point for the EN product server.

release.description: This release of the Transport Proxy is a point build of the component for the integrated releases 5.0.0 and 5.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Added support for accessing Product Servers via HTTPS.
Updated the Installation document to include details on configuration of the application.

release.description: This release of Transport Proxy is a component of the integrated releases 4.0.0, 4.1.0 and 5.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release supporting the deployment of the system at the Engineering Node.
release.action: Moved this project from the Portal component to the Transport component and renamed it from product-query to transport-proxy.

release.description: This release of Product Query is a component of the integrated releases 3.0.0 and 3.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release supporting the deployment of the system at the Engineering Node.
release.action: Created the package based on the 3.0.11 release of the OODT Grid Product Server. The Product Servlet and associated classes were modified to remove dependencies on the early OODT infrastructure like the RMI Registry. This servlet, referenced at http://starbrite.jpl.nasa.gov/prod, was previously included in the Data Set View suite of web applications.
